name: Inverted World
description:
The game is a simple platformer shooter, where you have to change character according to the situation.

Comands:

W,A,S,D   -   to move around;

Space   -   to Jump;

Left Mouse Button  -  to shoot;

Right Click  -  to change character;

E   -  to interact;

- White enemies only receive white player damage, just as black enemies only receive black player damage.

Team:

Programming: Wigner Matos Costa

I am the only member of my team, the arts and music are not mine, I just program everything, I changed the color palette of the sprites and created some assets

Art:
